_header: Is a robber of rents and lands
_description: The fruits of lust — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Is a robour of rentis & londisIt is a prisoun of stronge
                    bondisIt is a front of sorwe & care& it is a swerd þat
                    wil nout spare
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 21.
